title: privacy risks
extract: Privacy risks may have serious consequences for an organisation, such as:perceived harm to privacy;a failure to meet public expectations on both the use and protection of personal information;retrospective imposition of regulatory conditions;More items...
extract_html:
Privacy risks may have serious consequences for an organisation, such as:
  • perceived harm to privacy;
  • a failure to meet public expectations on both the use and protection of personal information;
  • retrospective imposition of regulatory conditions;
More items...
